name: Super Marvin 64
description:
Couple notes, could've used more time to add more content and levels. Also the physics in WebGL weren't quite what was happening in Unity, and are a bit sluggish compared to what was happening in Unity. Could not determine why.

Programming by : Cody Lewis

3D Models, Animations, and Textures by : Snowy Owl

Snow Owl's Portfolio : https://www.artstation.com/wanderingowl

Music by : CodeManu

CodeManu's Portfolio : https://codemanu.itch.io/

Sound Effects by : SoundsByDane

SoundsByDane's Portfolio : https://soundsbydane.itch.io/8-bit-sound-pack
